sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>108</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/108</github_url> <message>If you want to create a TinyURL in ServiceNow, all you need is one line of code. ```javascript new GlideTinyURL().createTinyURL(url); ``` **Note:** glide.tiny_url_min_length controls the min length of URL to turn it as tinyURL.</message> <number>TIL0001112</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-27 12:26:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a707c8722f8b011051dad5f62799b68b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-29 05:56:09</sys_updated_on> <title>Tiny URL</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
